summary: This is an FBI 302 form documenting the interview of Martin Anthony Jackson, a former British Army member hired to provide security for Ghislaine Maxwell at her residence in Bradford, New Hampshire in mid-2020. Jackson describes the security arrangement, Maxwell's lifestyle in hiding, and mentions the presence of Scott Borgerson at the property.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was living in seclusion at a residence in Bradford, New Hampshire in mid-2020, not leaving the property and using former British Army personnel for security.
The security arrangement was organized by Matthew Hellyer, who was retained by Maxwell's brother Kevin, and involved a rotating detail of former British Army colleagues paid $350 per day.
Scott Borgerson, to whom a 2019 Ford F-150 used by the security detail was registered, was observed on several occasions at Maxwell's house.
Maxwell provided a business debit card from Citizen's Bank to her security detail for purchasing needed items.
The security detail was aware of Maxwell's background and the allegations against her when taking the assignment.
